::Hot Rod::

He ran, but caught the shckwave of an explosian. He struggled to his
feet, and kept shooting at all enemys.

::Dimolition::

He flew into the battle. He sprayed the enemys with 50cal. gattaling gun
fire.
"Hey Zardus, I'm Dimolition, with Havoc. Dimolition, TERRORIZE!" He
turned to bot mode.
"Hey Havoc, when the others arrive, I say we go to gestalt mode, and
kick tailgate!"
